\usetikzlibrary{arrows}

\begin{document}
\definecolor{sqsqsq}{rgb}{0.12549019607843137,0.12549019607843137,0.12549019607843137}
\begin{tikzpicture}[line cap=round,line join=round,>=triangle 45,x=1cm,y=1cm]
\begin{axis}[

axis lines=middle,

ymax=23.495844155844146,

\draw [->,line width=2pt] (13.573419913419913,10.871948051948053) -- (13.590735930735935,12.378961038961036);
